subject: Relationships
title: No Contact: The Healing Boundary
description: One-minute skill: No Contact: The Healing Boundary.

hook.text: Every text from your ex reopens the wound. 'No contact' isn't petty revenge ‚Äî it's neurological self-defense.

buildup.text: No contact means zero communication: no calls, texts, social media, or 'accidental' meetings. Complete severance.

discovery.text: The brain needs 60-90 days without contact to begin breaking the addiction-like trauma bond.

twist.text: 'But we can be friends' is the most common relapse trigger. Friendship requires equality that never existed here.

climax.text: No contact isn't punishment. It's the minimum distance your nervous system needs to start remembering who you are.

punchline.text: No contact isn't cruelty. It's the boundary your healing requires.

quiz.question: How long does the brain need without contact to break a trauma bond?
